1.0.name: wordpress/authorize-by-ip
1.0.description: Authorize by IP allows access to a wordpress website behind an existing website based on the visitor's IP. This is especially useful during the development of a new wordpress website, allowing access to the client to view progress. The plugin will authorize their computer with a cookie allowing prolonged access. The plugin lets you specify where non authorized visitors are redirected to, or to a custom under construction page.
